title: Grand Theft Auto I, II + London, III (GTA 1, 2, 3) - OST [FLAC]
description:
Now here are the soundtracks from the first five Grand Theft Auto games, ripped, tagged and uncompressed!

GTA London 1969 and GTA London 1961 share the same soundtrack. Their soundtrack was easily accessible, for the game disc is also an audio CD, so I just made a copy of the disc. 

As the soundtrack for GTA 1, London and 2 consists in mixes and the tracklisting may be a bit tricky to find, I included a .txt file with all the tracks. GTA 3 tracks are very easy to find.

Except for GTA 1, each radio station comes with a folder picture ; sometimes I had to do it on Photoshop, but anyway.

Enjoy! I'll be seeding for some time, but seed anyway!
